intro: Haloragis pithyoides, commonly known as the silverleaf stellaria, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It is a low-growing herb with small, silver-gray leaves that are covered in fine hairs. The plant produces clusters of tiny, white flowers that bloom in spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal regions. Haloragis pithyoides is adapted to arid conditions and is drought-tolerant.
